about.title: Phil Mayne
about.subTitle: About
about.body:
A self-motivated, focused individual with a mature and responsible attitude to work and a willingness to build upon industry standards.

User experience is at the core of my work and I strive to create easy and accessible experiences for clients and their customers.

My knowledge from working with great products within the SaaS industry, has resulted in contributing as a key member for the development and growth of my own skillset and of the team around me.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subTitle: Frontend UX development
skills.body:
Working alongside senior members of teams such as Head of UX and senior backend developers I have gained crucial skills and knowledge to deliver enterprise level products.

Such skills include:

  • Creating a framework built through VueJS to create dynamic and autogenerated content
  • Webpack configuration to minify and bundle only the very necessary assets needed for performant delivery
  • Introducing unit testing using the popular Jest framework and 'Vue Test Utils'
